scripts.build: yarn build:graphql && yarn run build:ts && yarn run build:scss
scripts.build:ts: yarn run in-repo tsc --outDir ../../../dist --noEmit false --declaration true --rootDir . && yarn run tsc-alias --project stash/ui/v2.5/tsconfig.json --outDir dist
scripts.build:theme-file: node -e 'import("fs/promises").then(fs => fs.readFile("stash/ui/v2.5/src/index.scss", "utf8")).then(file => file.replaceAll( /\@import "src\/[^\n]*\n/g, "" )).then(console.log);' | cat ./build/theme-variables.css - | bash -c 'cd stash/ui/v2.5 && node_modules/.bin/sass --stdin --load-path=. --load-path=src ../../../dist/theme.css'
scripts.build:scss: yarn build:scss:copy-existing && yarn build:theme-vars-sass-file && yarn build:theme-vars-css-file && yarn build:scss:scene-player && yarn build:theme-file
scripts.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd stash && git reset --hard v0.28.1 && echo 'ui/v2.5/graphql/stash-tv.graphql' >> $(git rev-parse --git-dir)/info/exclude && rm -f ui/v2.5/graphql/stash-tv.graphql && git apply ../patches/stash-tv.patch && cd ui/v2.5/graphql && yarn install
scripts.update:patch: cd stash && git add -f ui/v2.5/graphql/stash-tv.graphql && git diff --cached > ../patches/stash-tv.patch && git restore --staged ui/v2.5/graphql/stash-tv.graphql
scripts.add-stash-ui-deps: jq -s '.[1] + {dependencies: .[1].dependencies + .[0].dependencies | with_entries(.) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries}' stash/ui/v2.5/package.json package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
